title: @RIOT, Have you guys ever ran a D&D game in Runeterra?
body: So, this question is mainly directed at RIOT employees. Have you guys ever created a Dungeons and Dragons campaign in the Runeterra universe? Did you guys use any of the characters from League as PC's or NPC's?

replies.body: I believe there's a group that runs games fairly regularly - though I think it's a homebrew system that's lighter on systems and heavier on the storytelling.  Not sure if it's all OCs or if they play as champs, or if they are reserved for NPCs!

Funny how it's bio resonding to this....I'm still on to you whether or not you are involved with a project to turn into a second game for riot.....lol I'm joking

If they finish fleshing out the Lore and don't retcon the core principles again, this would be a cool way for them to keep players at least tangentially engaged. I have lost a lot of love for the actual gameplay of League, but I do enjoy Lore and am a fan of D&D as well as several other d20-based games (d20 modern, Mutants and Masterminds, Star Wars RPG, etc...). If Riot published a d20 flavor with their IP, I would almost definitely pick it up.
I think AnimaRPG system would work smoother than D&D. To each their own, I guess.

I did for awhile. 

Was playing with some new players, and I wanted some story/characters to draw on so it would be less work for me. None of the other people in my group played LoL, so it wasn't a fan service type thing. It was more to make my job easier.

They came away convinced that Garen, Vayne, and Tryndamere were all badasses, and they all hated Talon. I did my job.
